description: center rectangle, 11-1/2" x 9-1/2", made up of geometric patterns of cross stitch surrounded by rows of parallel bands of snowflake cross stitch; geometric cross stitch pattern on ends complete solid cross stitch covering; black, red, green, white with black fringe; two rust braided yarn ties

title: Head Wrap
